discourse_list.title: Article: MakerDAO \xe2\x80\x98Endgame Plan\xe2\x80\x99 Calls for Specialized DAOs, Says Protocol is Held Back by Complexity

content.content: cryptonews.com    MakerDAO ‘Endgame Plan’ Calls for Specialized DAOs, Says Protocol is Held... A detailed proposal to bring the MakerDAO (MKR) protocol to a “predetermined, immutable end state” by setting up several new decentralized autonomous organizations (DAO) has been published by the protocol’s founder Rune Christensen. The plan aims to...      Ok, they are quoting from the forum here! I wonder how far reaching these articles end up being? Do they help onboard ? I guess even if it captures the attention of one person it helps. I’m looking forward to when people join the forum and say they heard about Maker when reading one of these articles.
